short_summary: The military department has a requirement for hose assemblies as requested by the CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt military installations. The delivery of hose assemblies is requested at CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt according to the specifications mentioned below.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Item 1, GSIN: 4720, NSN: 01-6163518, HOSE ASSEMBLY, NONMETALLIC Part No.: 082304-604, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. OR Part No.: 082304-200-24, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. Quantity: 20, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. Item 2, GSIN: 4720, NSN: 01-6163518, HOSE ASSEMBLY, NONMETALLIC Part No.: 082304-604, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. OR Part No.: 082304-200-24, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. Quantity: 10, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Item 3, GSIN: 4720, NSN: 01-6163522, HOSE ASSEMBLY, NONMETALLIC Part No.: 082304-605, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. OR Part No.: 082304-200-15, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. Quantity: 20, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. Item 4, GSIN: 4720, NSN: 01-6163522, HOSE ASSEMBLY, NONMETALLIC Part No.: 4720, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. OR Part No.: 082304-200-15, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. Quantity: 5, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Hose Assemblies

**Title:** Hose Assemblies for Department of National Defence
**Reference Number:** cb-6026-42652636 (Amendment 1)
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-241596/A

**Description:** The Department of National Defence is seeking quotations for the supply and delivery of hose assemblies as outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Scope of Work:** The bid specifications detail the required quantities and specifications for the hose assemblies, which are to be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Key Deliverables:**

* 20 Hose Assemblies, Nonmetallic, Type 01-6163518, Part No.: 082304-604 or 082304-200-24, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. (to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia)
* 10 Hose Assemblies, Nonmetallic, Type 01-6163518, Part No.: 082304-604 or 082304-200-24, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. (to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)
* 20 Hose Assemblies, Nonmetallic, Type 01-6163522, Part No.: 082304-605 or 082304-200-15, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. (to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia)
* 5 Hose Assemblies, Nonmetallic, Type 01-6163522, Part No.: 082304-605 or 082304-200-15, NCAGE: 56529, HYDRAULICS INTERNATIONAL, INC. (to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia)

**Submission Guidelines:**

* Proposals must be submitted in either English or French.
* Bidders must provide prices in Canadian dollars.
* Equivalent or substitute products require documentation of their brand name and model, Part Number, and NCAGE.

**Important Dates:**

* Publication Date: June 2, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 5, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Export and Trade Agreement Requirements:**

This tender is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
